title: Distributed lithium battery pack energy storage system

events.title: Application filed by Chongqing University of Technology

classifications.description: Circuits for equalisation of charge between batteries using switched or multiplexed charge circuits
Balancing the charge of battery modules

Emergency protective circuit arrangements specially adapted for specific types of electric machines or apparatus or for sectionalised protection of cable or line systems, and effecting automatic switching in the event of an undesired change from normal working conditions for batteries; for accumulators

abstract: The invention discloses a distributed lithium battery pack energy storage system, which includes a plurality of energy storage control units for connecting to a DC bus in parallel; data sharing is performed between the energy storage control units through bus communication; the energy storage control unit includes a single A battery pack composed of a bulk lithium battery, a bidirectional DC converter, a microcontroller and a state monitoring module; each microcontroller is equipped with an independent charging control program, and the independent charging control program is used according to the corresponding energy storage control unit. The state monitoring data and the DC bus voltage U A determine the charging mode of the corresponding energy storage control unit; each microcontroller is equipped with a cooperative discharge control program, which is used to determine the overall performance according to the shared data and the DC bus voltage U A discharge mode. The invention solves the technical problems of low reliability and low energy utilization rate of the lithium battery of the lithium battery pack energy storage system in the prior art, and can prolong the service life of the lithium battery and reduce the cost.
abstract_original: 本发明公开了一种分布式锂电池组储能系统，包括若干用于并联到直流母线上的储能控制单元；储能控制单元之间通过总线通信进行数据共享；储能控制单元包括由单体锂电池组成的电池组、双向直流变换器、微控制器与状态监测模块；每个微控制器内均配置有独立充电控制程序，所述独立充电控制程序用于根据对应储能控制单元的状态监测数据与直流母线电压UA确定相应储能控制单元的充电模式；每个微控制器内均配置有协同放电控制程序，协同放电控制程序用于根据共享数据与直流母线电压UA确定整体放电模式。本发明解决了现有技术中锂电池组储能系统的锂电池可靠性与能量利用率不高的技术问题，能够延长锂电池使用寿命，降低成本。
claims: 2.根据权利要求1所述的分布式锂电池组储能系统，其特征在于：电池组的状态监测数据包括电池组端电压、电池组输出电流与电池组温度；微控制器采用等效电路模型并根据电池组端电压、电池组输出电流与电池组温度对电池组的剩余电量SOC进行计算；电池组端电压与电池组输出电流作为微控制器控制双向直流变换器实现不同充电模式的依据。2. The distributed lithium battery pack energy storage system according to claim 1, wherein the state monitoring data of the battery pack includes the battery pack terminal voltage, the battery pack output current and the battery pack temperature; the microcontroller adopts an equivalent circuit The model calculates the remaining power SOC of the battery pack according to the battery pack terminal voltage, the battery pack output current and the battery pack temperature; the battery pack terminal voltage and the battery pack output current are used as the basis for the microcontroller to control the bidirectional DC converter to realize different charging modes. .

4.根据权利要求1所述的分布式锂电池组储能系统，其特征在于：电池组由若干性能相近的单体锂电池并联组成。4 . The distributed lithium battery pack energy storage system according to claim 1 , wherein the battery pack is composed of several single lithium batteries with similar performance in parallel. 5 .

7.根据权利要求6所述的分布式锂电池组储能系统，其特征在于：未被选中的能够工作的储能控制单元作为备用模块，用于在工作模块故障时投入工作。7 . The distributed lithium battery pack energy storage system according to claim 6 , wherein the unselected energy storage control units that can work are used as backup modules to be put into work when the working module fails. 8 .

8.根据权利要求6所述的分布式锂电池组储能系统，其特征在于：工作模块的数量为根据负载功率确定所需投入的能够工作的储能控制单元的最小数量。8 . The distributed lithium battery pack energy storage system according to claim 6 , wherein the number of working modules is the minimum number of working energy storage control units determined according to the load power. 9 .

9.根据权利要求2所述的分布式锂电池组储能系统，其特征在于：双向直流变换器的状态监测数据包括双向直流变换器温度；还包括微控制器中还配置有温度保护程序，当电池组温度或双向直流变换器温度高出相应的温度阈值时，则控制储能控制单元退出运行。9 . The distributed lithium battery pack energy storage system according to claim 2 , wherein: the state monitoring data of the bidirectional DC converter includes the temperature of the bidirectional DC converter; and a temperature protection program is also configured in the microcontroller, When the temperature of the battery pack or the bidirectional DC converter is higher than the corresponding temperature threshold, the energy storage control unit is controlled to exit operation.
